KitKat:;

She had only a few more cycles untill the chamber would release her. 
Then she would go after Perceptor. "Who does that bot think he's 
messing with? I am KitKat, Once great leader of the Predacons. i 
killed more bots than he's had hot meals." she muttered to herself 
inside the chamber. She realized that it was her in the chamber and 
not him. She sighed and wondered if she was getting slow in her old 
age. After all, she was one of the few from ages back. Not many bots 
could have survived that war. If they did, they would be extremely 
few in number. But then again, she reflected on how it was her in the 
chamber and not that pompus, egotistical, shovanistic, waste of metal 
male who put her in the chamber. He may have won this round. But 
she'd get him and finish him off when she saw her chance.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor moved towards the Brigde of Predacon's base
>

> >

> > SharpClaw: The dart effect will wear off, but we'll speed it up 
in

> > SharpClaw takes KitKat to an CR chamber, placing her within it,

> >  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Carnatron felt her frequency fading. He 
> turned to Perceptor. He stared at him 
> > codly. "I'll have Hydras deal with you! Fighting amongst 
> yourselves, your 
> > pathetic. When she wakes up I hope she kicks ur metallic ass." He 
> walked over 
> > to Kit Kat. "This will help keep her stable until we get her into 
> a CR

> body and 
> > placed it on Kit Kat. He gave it one instruction to keep her 
alive 
> until the

> willingly seperate

Kit 
> Kat it 
> > would listen to her as well. If it changed her at all it would be 
> diffrent 
> > then his change since he was a pure energon body when it attached 
> to him. (If 
> > you want you can just have it die when she gets fixed or have it 
> change her a

> > > KitKat::
> > >

> corner

> > > programs wouldn't give up. Yet, she remained unconsious.
